name: Welcome Door Mat for Front Door – Outdoor Coir Doormat with Non-Slip Backing, Durable Entrance for Outside Entryway, Easy Clean for Home Décor, 30”x17”
short_description: 🏡 Perfect Outdoor Welcome Mat – Add charm to your front porch with this stylish coir welcome mat, ideal for any outdoor entrance, patio, or doorway. This large front door mat features a sturdy design that stays in place and resists wear from rain, snow, or sun. 🧹 Easy to Clean & Maintain – Simply shake, sweep, or lightly vacuum to remove dirt and debris.
